name: HEL (RolaRoleiro)
description:
HEL is  a  pixel art space shoot-em-up, where you can upgrade your ship  and unlock skills!

This is my first "real" game. It was made with the sole intent on learning the process of game development, so any feedback is welcome and  appreciated.

I plan on working more on this game in the future,  like adding multiple skills, player ships to unlock and  more levels and bosses, but it will depend on whether people think it has potential or like the idea.

MUSIC USED

- Infraction by Vladmir Ershov

- Free Game Menu Soundtrack by cactusdude

I made all the code and sound, while the skill icons can be found here . If you liked any other asset fell free to ask me for information.
